body:
#  The Perioperative Echocardiography Protocols of Toronto General Hospital

Copyright Lynn & Arnold Irwin Advanced Perioperative Imaging Lab (APIL), Department of Anesthesia & Pain Management, Toronto General Hospital 2015

Under the following terms:

This work was created using [Inkscape](http://inkscape.org; ) (GNU GPL V.2) vector graphics software. All original working files (Inkscape SVG) format are available at 
www.TGHPeriopEcho.ca/APIL. Other formats can be provided on request.
